name: MrWeasel
0:
”Alexa, ask Mr. Weasel for advice”
”give bad advice”
”launch Mr. Weasel”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.

des: If you just want a reason to do a "facepalm" try Bad Advice Alexa.
